backend/main.mo: Backend canister with authorization, blob storage mixins, car spec types, price prediction logic, validation, and user-specific prediction history storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping production deployment feature requirements to involved files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, dark mode overrides, and base utility styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata, Open Graph and Twitter tags, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide detailing production deployment prerequisites, checklists, user flow testing, SEO validation, and step‑by‑step deployment steps.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Empty robots.txt placeholder for crawler rules.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Empty sitemap.xml placeholder for search engine indexing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring authentication, profile setup, prediction flow routing, and React Query providers.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section displaying project overview, ML description, founder info, and contact details fetched from backend.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Empty file reserved for future admin dashboard implementation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, social links, dynamic contact info, founder details, and a bottom copyright bar.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements a responsive header with scroll effects, navigation, user profile display, and login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the homepage hero section with animated visuals, headings, CTAs, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/LoginForm.tsx: Provides an Internet Identity login form with loading states, error handling, and account creation link.
frontend/src/components/PredictionForm.t: Implements a detailed car price prediction form with validations, numerous car brand options, and submission to the prediction API.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Renders a profile creation form allowing users to submit name and email with validation and backend saving.
frontend/src/components/SEOHead.tsx: Injects JSON-LD metadata for SEO into the document head using a React effect.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Dfinity AuthClient, handling identity loading, login, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, contact info, car price predictions, and prediction history using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode settings, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and configuration for build planning.
